import React, { Component } from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' export default function AddCaption(props) { let [caption, updateCaption] = useState("") const handleClick = (e) => { e.preventDefault() alert('you have a meme') } return (<>

ADD A CAPTION

updateCaption(e.target.value)} type='text'placeholder="caption" value={caption}> console.log(onClick={handleClick})
) }
